駤字的基本解释

駤
zhì
横蛮无理：“胡人有知利者，而人谓之駤。”
古同“騺”。
马高大。

駤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》陟利切，去至，知。］
蛮横无理。

駤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1437第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?陟利切，音致。【玉篇】?駤，馬躊蹰不前也。【博雅】?駤，止也。　又馬高大。　又【淮南子·修務訓】胡人有知利者，而人謂之駤。【註】忿戾不通達也。

駤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駤字的起名意思

暂无。

駤
Basic explanation of words
駤
zhì
Unreasonable and unreasonable: "Husbands have knowledge and benefits, and people are called squatters."
Ancient Tong "騺".
The horse is tall.
駤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" Zhili cut, go to, know. ]
Outrageous and unreasonable.
駤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駤; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1437 Page 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zhili cut, sound. [Jade articles]? Zhuang, Ma hesitated. [Bo Ya]? 駤, stop also.　The horse is tall and tall.　[Huainanzi·Xiuwuxun] Hu people have knowledge and profit, and people are called 駤. [Note] Anxious and incomprehensible.
駤
